response.overview: As Republican President Donald Trump sets out on the campaign road for his second term as the leader of the free world, the democrats make their bid to take him down. With over a dozen democratic candidates hoping to win the nomination, who will come out on top? And will they be able to defeat Trump? Learn about this historical race in this hard hitting 2-part documentary series, 2020 The Democratic Bid.
response.title: 2020 Election: The Democratic Bid
